title: Bug 49536 - Incorrect HTTP response when accessing a URL with no webapps deployed
description: When starting a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed and accessing a URL, the server returns a HTTP code 200 OK response with no content, instead of an expected HTTP error 404 response.
OB: Upon starting a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed, when I access a URL, the server returns a HTTP code 200 OK response with no content.
EB: The server should return a HTTP error 404 response instead of a successful 200 OK response with no content.
SR:
To reproduce this issue, follow these steps:
1. Download the Tomcat 7 zip file from http://mirror.veriportal.com/apache/tomcat/tomcat7/v7.0.0beta/bin/apachetomcat7.0.0.zip.
2. Start a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed.
3. Access a URL on the server.
   - Expected: Receive a HTTP error 404 response.
   - Actual: Receive a HTTP code 200 OK response with no content.
